text: 'afara'ayt -ayha alrswl- man atakhadh hawah 'ilhana lh, fala yhwa shyyana 'iilaa faealh, wadllah allah baed bulugh aleilm 'iilayh waqiam alhujat elyh, fala yasmae mwaez allh, wala yuetabar bha, watubie ealaa qlbh, fala yaeqil bih shyyana, wajaeal ealaa basarih ghta', fala yubsir bih hijaj allh? faman ywfqh li'iisabat alhaqu walrshd baed 'idlal allah 'iyah? 'afala tadhakarun -ayha alnas- ftelmu ann man faeal allah bih dhlk falan yahtadi abdana, walan yajid linafsih wlyana mrshdana? walayt 'asl fi althdhyr min 'an yakun alhwa hu albaeth lilmuminin ealaa aemalhm
